comments.body:
I noticed that some of the files in the ramda package aren't formatted with the current version of prettier at https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/.prettierrc.json

To not having unrelated file changes I haven't used prettier for my contributions at `types/ramda/tools.d.ts` and `types/ramda/index.d.ts`. Would it be okay run prettier there or shall this be in another PR?

> I noticed that some of the files in the ramda package aren't formatted with the current version of prettier at https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/.prettierrc.json
> 
> To not having unrelated file changes I haven't used prettier for my contributions at `types/ramda/tools.d.ts` and `types/ramda/index.d.ts`. Would it be okay run prettier there or shall this be in another PR?

If the changes are unrelated to this issue, you should definitely make a new PR if you can! That would be great too
